Job Title: Python DeveloperCompany: Jeevay SoftLocation: RemoteSalary: 250,000 PKR per monthWorking Hours: 8:00 PM - 4:00 AM (7 working hours with a one-hour break)Working Days: Monday to SaturdayAbout Jeevay Soft:Jeevay Soft is a dynamic and innovative tech company specializing in cutting-edge software solutions. We seek a skilled Python developer to join our team and contribute to developing our J-Health Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS).Responsibilities:Develop and manage Python-based solutions.Collaborate with the Python Team Lead to deliver high-quality results.Set up and managed interfaces for the J-Health (LIMS) system, ensuring compatibility with multiple laboratory information systems (LIS) and machines.Troubleshoot and resolve issues efficiently to maintain seamless system operations.Ensure best practices in code quality, security, and system performance.Requirements:Proficiency in Python programming with a strong understanding of its frameworks and libraries.Prior experience in integrating systems and working with APIs.Knowledge of laboratory systems or healthcare software is a plus.Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently under the guidance of a team lead.Dedication, a strong work ethic, and excellent communication skills. What We Offer:Competitive monthly salary of 250,000 PKR.Opportunity to work on impactful projects in the healthcare domain.A supportive and collaborative team environment.Flexible remote working arrangements.Probation Period:This role includes an initial 3-month probation period, during which we will evaluate your performance, dedication, and overall contribution to the team.How to Apply:If you're a passionate Python developer ready to take on this exciting opportunity, we want to hear from you! Send your updated resume and a brief cover letter to 0302-9397893&Hr@mpbillers.com with the subject line "Application for Python Developer - Jeevay Soft.Join us in revolutionizing the healthcare tech industry!hashtag#Hiring

job_description: hashtag#Hiring Alert for "Entry level"!US Candidates (Remote)1. Front End Developer.2. Data Analyst.3. Back End Developer.4. Android Developer.6. Flutter Developer.6. WordPress Developer.7. Angular Developer,8. JavaScript Developer.9. Python Developer.10. Full Stack Developers.Location:- RemoteEXP:- Interns To 5 YearSalary:- $700 To $4400 / MonthlyHow To Apply Comment hashtaghashtag#Interested " in below Comment Box, So we will review your Profile.Follow me for jobs actively hiring now and land your dream job!Guys, when we see a post of this type, we must think a little before we run and comment on it with the word "interested" or "interested", we are programmers and we have enough awareness.Is it really in a reputable company that will hire someone who is attached to the word ZD?Is there a company that will talk or see the profile of the 10-15 thousand comments and evaluate the choice of comments based on which?If the company is serious, it will ask to send your CV to e-mail, or communicate via WhatsApp, form, or LinkedIn.Other than that, this is often someone who tries to gather followers and Rich on the empty.Let us be more conscious, and make sure before we waste our time on meaningless needs.
